main event: A civilian woman observed a shining object from the back porch of her house in Manitou Springs, Colorado on April 17, 1955.
interesting points: The object appeared to be hovering over nearby hills in the vicinity of an old rock quarry,An Air Force aircraft flying over the area the next day identified silver wreckage in the same spot,The witness reported that the object was stationary and unmoving,The sighting was classified under the type 'Ground-Visual',Due to the identification of the object as a reflection from aircraft wreckage, no further investigation was authorized.
